title: Brush Script Font Wanting Opinions.
content:
This font was done using a brush, I wanted to keep it looking organic.

Did I achieve that effect?  
any questions or comments are welcome!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317213008im_/http:/typophile.com/files/WASSABBI-01_6301.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317213008im_/http:/typophile.com/files/WASSABBI-02-01_5278.png)
author: nicco_vasquez

comments.content: While the strokes seem fairly natural the curvature of all the downstrokes seem unnatural as a writing style. It kind of takes the energy out of it. Did you have a specific use for this in mind or is it just something you're experimenting with.
It is very consistent but as set in all caps not very dynamic.
|W| looks a bit clunky to me.
